title: I am a big fan of basketball
body: I am a big fan of basketball, this site offers me really great features, that's what I like

title: As other people have stated here
body: As other people have stated here, they simply just withdraw money from your card even though you have cancelled the subscription. STAY AWAY!

title: Omg......where to start.......the…
body: Omg......where to start.......the nba......what can I say ......always scouting n looking for new talent......classy organization that’s treat their fans n whoever involve in it like family.......don’t ask what the nba can do for you ......what you can do for the nba.....you want to be something.....then the nba is what  you should put a ring on......haha.......nba.....ohhh...........wow.......n endless dreams haha........

title: NBA Website review by Sonny Hammoud
body: Very good website as it gives me all the information I want to know such as news, season standings, and results. I especially like the Playoff Picture section as well.

title: Avoid …
body: As others have said be aware of buying an NBA pass if your a fan of an NBA team wanting to watch games outside the USA.

title: Fed up with Prima Dona players that…
body: Fed up with Prima Dona players that care more about social justice politics rather than working on their game. NBA has gone downhill from David stern. Bird, magic, and Michael built up the leave and Lebron is destroying it. Sad.

title: I do not agree with the decision of…
body: I do not agree with the decision of continuing the season despite the pandemic. I think of it as a cash grab that doesn't care about the well-being of their players. David Stern wouldn't have allowed this. So disappointing.

title: BLM fed up
body: I used to love to watch the NBA and the basketball players but now I am fed up with all the black life matters it's just too much in your face and if basketball players want to be politicians then drop the ball and run for office because if politicians want to run play basketball that's what they would do stop this black life matters nonsense on every game you play we're tired of it

title: Pretty good website but heavy
body: Pretty good website, but it has become progressively heavier to me.

title: I love what the NBA offers
body: I love what the NBA offers. The game play, the demonstration of skill, and athleticism keep me coming back. The company engages social issue, instead of avoiding them.  My only complaint are the occasional games rigged by bad calls. It's extra obvious in the bubble. This is my favorite sporting league to watch.

title: Take A Knee, Up your A**
body: I  WILL NEVER HAVE ANYTHING TO DO WITH NBA (NOTHING BUT ANARCHISTS) AGAIN.  THE CORONA IS GONNA EAT THE LEAGUE UP ANYWAY....ESPECIALLY WHEN SH**TING ON GOD AND COUNTRY!   KNEEL DOWN TO THE FLAG YOU REJECT. YOU CAN’T HANDLE THE ADVERSITY....GO PLAY IN AFRICA OR IRAN....MAYBE YOU CAN GET A FRESH PERSPECTIVE ON HOW THINGS REALLY ARE HERE.  NOT A SINGLE DIME FROM ME EVER AGAIN...AND ANYONE ELSE I CONVINCE HOW BAD THE NBA SUCKS.  I WILL GET SEVERAL HUNDRED FOR SURE.

title: The best basketball site in the world.
body: Years ago, I watched basketball for the first time. I like Lebron James the way he plays. So, I decided to go to this site and watch kingjames highlights always!! The site has also, live coverage for your favorite team/s. I'm so excited to watch again NBA games on July 31. All is well!!

title: Just got my new Lebron jersey delivered…
body: Just got my new Lebron jersey delivered and it's on point 😍

title: NBA League Pass è multipiattaforma e…
body: NBA League Pass è multipiattaforma e tanto capillare quanto completo. Il tutto Senza interruzioni pubblicitarie!

title: News and transaction information…
body: News and transaction information updated in a timely manner, very good

title: Awesome experience
body: Awesome! I like it!

title: Necessary for NBA lovers
body: If you like NBA, this is the best website hands down. Everything you need is already there.

title: Always updated
body: I am always updated even if I am away from home, very detailed site, which lots of articles, news, live events, photos. So I will not be behind with NBA stuffs.

title: le site de reference pour le basket !
Beware !  International customers are treated like dirt
body: The NBA International League Pass has appalling customer support.  Requests to cancel a subscription are responded to with lies, misdirection and a refusal to cancel the subscription. Eventually (after they have stolen your money) they simply stop responding to emails and there is no other way to make contact. If you email the NBA directly they simply refuse to help because you live outside the US.

title: Good website and features - NBA league pass to complicated.
body: I paid for leaguepass through itunes and have been having issues log in and i have not been able to access it yet.

title: Great product, but expensive and hard to cancel membership
Love it!
body: Love going on and seeing all the best plays and highlights from the games. Easy to follow your team and to get all the NBA news you could possibly need.

title: Where amazing happens
body: All players, stats, results, videos, the official site of the NBA is the reference for NBA fans !
